newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungary interest rates to continue falling - finmin.
newsitem.headline: Hungary interest rates to continue falling - finmin.

text.p: The decline in interest rate in Hungary will continue despite the National Bank of Hungary's (NBH) surprise rate hike last Monday, Finance Minister Peter Medgyessy said on Tuesday.

"The NBH rate hike does not mean that the (declining) trend is reversed, rather that the central bank is taking care to ensure the stability of the market," Medgyessy told a meeting of stock dealers and journalists during his visit to the Budapest Stock Exchange.
